actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend section 901 of the Education Amendments of 1972 to allow mother-daughter and father-son events in elementary and secondary schools.

summary.text: Amends the Education Amendments of 1972 to exempt from the sex discrimination prohibition of such Act mother-daughter or father-son events held by elementary or secondary schools.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 901 of the Education Amendments of 1972 to allow mother-daughter and father-son events in elementary and secondary schools.
